item.title: Paypal: click does nothing
item.description: All systems have glitches, but with PayPal it is systemic. It is astonishing how often something doesn’t work in PayPal’s system:

item.title: Disqus seems to have gone to shitter
item.description: Email notification links not working Clicks from new comment notifications not taking me to the comment, but instead Disqus homepage (?!): Signing in is not working Privacy issues The notification links seem to track my clicks: Twitter login requests too many privileges: Summary All systems have problems from time to time, but the amount of issues indicate a systemic problem. Disqus is garbage. Need to research better options.
